original_text: “But you did not listen to me,” declares the Lord, “and you have aroused my anger with what your hands have made, and you have brought harm to yourselves.”
korean_text: 너희가 내 말을 순종하지 아니하고 너희 손으로 만든 것으로써 나의 노여움을 일으켜 스스로 해하였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: But you did not listen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 내 말을 듣지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: and you have aroused my anger
with what your hands have made
and you have brought harm to yourselves
